import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Fragment } from 'react' import {Container,Row,Col,Card} from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Breadcrumb from 'react-bootstrap/Breadcrumb' class Category extends Component { render() { const MyList = this.props.ProductData; const Category = this.props.Category; const MyView = MyList.map((ProductList,i)=>{ if(ProductList.special_price=="na"){ return

{ProductList.title}

Price : ${ProductList.price}

 } else{ return

{ProductList.title}

Price : ${ProductList.price} ${ProductList.special_price}

 } }); return (
Home {Category }

{Category }

{MyView} ) } } export default Category
